projects.name: Digital clock
projects.text: This simple web project provides the current time and date in a clear and accessible manner. With a minimalist design, it offers an intuitive experience for users seeking schedule.

projects.name: Tic tac toe
projects.text: This project, built with React, delivers a clear and accessible gaming experience. Featuring a minimalist design, it provides users with an intuitive interface to enjoy the classic game of Tic Tac Toe.
